mj6OB0IZQZ36rqAn6.name: Oxygen Storage
mj6OB0IZQZ36rqAn6.notes: Can hold breath 25 times as long as normal

m1GUjlIeF92u9iaDV.name: Oxygen Storage
m1GUjlIeF92u9iaDV.notes: Can hold breath 50 times as long as normal

mYvpm5nMUIXueZVLV.name: Oxygen Storage
mYvpm5nMUIXueZVLV.notes: Can hold breath 100 times as long as normal

mwYBYE7jS4MUMiBFZ.name: Oxygen Storage
mwYBYE7jS4MUMiBFZ.notes: Can hold breath 200 times as long as normal

mEhysVloS7DLHYG33.name: Oxygen Storage
mEhysVloS7DLHYG33.notes: Can hold breath 300 times as long as normal

tPzulIkBfkEByxy7a.name: Flight
tPzulIkBfkEByxy7a.notes: Air Move is Basic Speed x 2 (drop all fractions)

mupmtXkQ_G5EpMKu_.name: Diffuse
mupmtXkQ_G5EpMKu_.notes: Immune to crippling injuries. Brain, Vitals and Groin cannot be targeted. Most foes cannot slam or grapple you (GM's decision). Do not bleed. Unaffected by blood-borne toxins. Immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body. Impaling and piercing attacks of any size never do more than 1 HP of injury, regardless of penetrating damage. Other attacks never do more than 2 HP of injury. Exception: Area-effect, cone, and explosion attacks cause normal injury

mKvAkpOlfi_KUsPsZ.name: Homogenous
mKvAkpOlfi_KUsPsZ.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1/2, pi+ is x1/3, pi is x1/5, pi- is x1/10

mR_26ErYb_V-Z7nfS.name: No Blood
mR_26ErYb_V-Z7nfS.notes: Do not bleed, unaffected by blood-borne toxins, immune to attacks that rely on cutting off blood to part of your body

mfgaGMxSp24gOYkLV.name: No Brain
mfgaGMxSp24gOYkLV.notes: Brain cannot be targeted. Blows to the skull or eye are treated like blows to the face, except that eye injury can still cripple the eye

m3Z9UrpZ2gxOvnhD5.name: No Eyes
m3Z9UrpZ2gxOvnhD5.notes: Eyes may not be targeted. Immune to blinding attacks

mO2Oba8uJ6qoV41uX.name: No Head
mO2Oba8uJ6qoV41uX.notes: Skull, Brain and Face cannot be targeted

mhAFohQi6c3SUTPZ9.name: No Neck
mhAFohQi6c3SUTPZ9.notes: Neck may not be targeted and cannot be decapitated, choked or strangled

mjZ2AChmf-73Ibt_S.name: No Vitals
mjZ2AChmf-73Ibt_S.notes: Attacks to the Vitals or Groin are treated as attacks to the Torso

mjD1YqO47gLLPuNOx.name: Unliving
mjD1YqO47gLLPuNOx.notes: Altered wound modifiers: imp & pi++ are x1, pi+ is x1/2, pi is x1/3, pi- is x1/5

mmvDHyoRH_d9QjFEr.name: Usually On
mmvDHyoRH_d9QjFEr.notes: Turning visible costs 1 FP per second
